location.address: Red Dot Traffic Building, 28 Maxwell Road

challenges.challenge: A new wristwatch to support time zones…
A feasible way to deal with wet umbrellas in malls without plastic bags…
Your perfect bathroom vanity spot set up…
A safe and elegant way to leave your laptop at a coffee shop table…
A set-up that encourages passengers to move into the public transport instead of clogging the entrance…
